title: Post Test
subtitle: Interim Requirements for Quality Records Training
instructions: Remember: For multiple choice questions, there may be multiple selections to answer the question correctly,

questions.question: When creating a Quality Record you may use which of the following
When should you begin using the training covered in this course?
answers: A Immediately after this training is completed
When you have been trained on and requested to implement PPIF's that generate Quality Records.

questions.question: The only way to correct an electronic Quality Record is to
answers: A The only way to correct an electronic Quality Record is to document the appropriate information about the correction in a log, sign and date the Iog entry, and make the correction in the clectronic system

questions.question: Quality Records may be filed:
answers: A.In a department central file area

questions.question: Quality Records are
answers: CAThe historical proof that demonstrate the execution of activities typically described by Quality System documents.
B.All Philip Morris records generated after the implementation of the Quality System.

questions.question: True or False
answers: A. When correcting a Quality Record you may erase the incorrect information and write the correct information on the record.

questions.question: True or False
answers: A.*If no information is required in a particular space on a Quality System form, you may leave it blank.

questions.question: When creating a Quality Record you must comply with:
answers: A.The training described in this course.
All instructions, procedures, and training requirements associated with the record.
